issue.title: visual and collision element with same name confuses gazebo visualization

content.raw:
Is this bug fixed?

I want to reproduce this bug with the same collision name and visual name. But the offset never appear. My Gazebo version is 4.0
Gazebo normaly shows as below.
![Screenshot from 2014-10-09 06_18_10.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/50519112-Screenshot_from_2014-10-09_06_18_10.png)
